column4: Hi, I've been having problems with 6.10 Ubuntu so I just installed the beta of the new one, after I complete installation and re-boot the grub loader does not show up.  I tried following a guide to set it up but still nothing, what can I do to check what's wrong?
having problems with a stable release so you switch to a beta?
Flannel : No errors at all, I just reboot and it goes straight to windows.  When I followed the howto on the ubuntu site it seems to be working but I reboot again and still, windows xp
haha, yes, 6.10 was too bad on my PC, took me forever to actually get it installed.  I can't boot from the 6.10 CD with my IDE drives enabled or it freezes etc
